overview: Playboy's video magazine featuring: "The Great Playmate Hunt"; Candy Loving is the playmate selected from 4000 candidates to represent Playboy on its 25th anniversary. In one of the most amazing talent hunts in history you'll see why! "Sylvia Kristel Profile"; Relive her famous love scenes from Emmanuelle, Lady Chatterley's Lover, and Private Lessons and hear her candid, revealing observations on her life and loves. "Playmate Playoffs"; A 16 playmate swimsuit spectacular! "Playmate Lynda Wiesmeier"; As uninhibited before the camera as she is in the pages of Playboy, a vigorous aerobic workout & an erotic shower. "Dudley Moore Interview"; Behind the scenes on "10", Susan Anton and more! Also features Duran Duran "Girls on Film"
title: Playboy Collector's Edition Volume 2
